file_content.text: [It looks like you aren't the only intruder in House Rist--only the most obvious one.]
[The man at your feet appears to be an Imperial spy. He also appears to be stone dead.]
[It doesn't take long for you to find the cause--the half-dozen toxic darts sticking out of him paint a pretty clear picture.]
[Whatever got him, he never saw it coming, and you make a mental note to stay on your toes while you're here.]
